overview: They're in search of something unknown and they find each other instead, to help cope with loneliness and strangeness of what surrounds them through conversation and movement. A choreographic narrative experimental film that explores the emotions and relationships of two female young adults through their bodies in space in a delicate and playful small story about intimacy.
tagline: Aloma i Mila are two women that meet in the fantastic lights of summer fake cities of the coast of Valencia.
title: Aloma & Mila
